parameter.name: smtpserver
parameter.description: URL of the smtp server to send the report files to.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port where the SMTP server accepts connections.

parameter.name: usetls
parameter.description: Whether to use TLS when connecting to the smtp server.

parameter.name: usessl
parameter.description: Whether to use SSL when connecting to the smtp server. Note, only 'email.usetls' or 'user.ssl' can be true.

parameter.name: authenticate
parameter.description: Whether the smtp server requires authentication (username + password).

parameter.name: credentials
parameter.description:
If the smtp server requires authentication you have to specify a file that contains username and password in the format:
username=your-username
password=your-password
Make sure that you set the file permission as restrictive as possible.

parameter.name: senderaddress
parameter.description: Email address that will appear as sender in the report email.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: Any string that should be prepended to the email's subject string.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Host as it is supposed to appear in the email's subject string.

parameter.name: recipients
parameter.description: A list of email addresses that receive the report emails.

parameter.name: magThresh
parameter.description: Only send a notification email if the magnitude threshold is exceeded.

parameter.name: eventbuffer
parameter.description: Time in seconds that events and the related objects are buffered.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.description: Server name that runs the ActiveMQ broker.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port on which ActiveMQ broker accepts stomp messages.

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: Username with which messages are sent.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: Password with which messages are sent.

parameter.name: topic
parameter.description: ActiveMQ broker topic to send alerts to.

parameter.name: hbtopic
parameter.description: ActiveMQ broker topic to send heart beats to.
